mapper.insert: insert into t_arrears_interest(id, serial_id, arrears_id, project_id, trice, amount, offset_amount, interest_amount, create_time, description) values ( #{id}, #{serialId}, #{arrearsId}, #{projectId}, #{trice}, #{amount}, #{offsetAmount}, #{interestAmount}, now(), #{description} )
mapper.update: update t_arrears_interest set serial_id = #{serialId}, arrears_id = #{arrearsId}, project_id = #{projectId}, trice = #{trice}, amount = #{amount}, offset_amount = #{offsetAmount}, interest_amount = #{interestAmount}, description = #{description}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
